alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 7:39PM CDT until May 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Smith County in north central Kansas... Northern Osborne County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Woodston to Gaylord, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Harlan around 745 PM CDT. Alton around 750 PM CDT. Portis around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Osborne and Downs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
